channel.title: My akward framerate problem!
channel.description:
Well, just a few days ago, i just started to get 1 FPS at a random time for, about 5 minutes. And since Black mesa SHOULD release this year, i dont want to have this LAGGGGG at random times, especially killing those damn face huggers.
i don't know the problem, i've updated my GPU, Motherboard, and Windows.
its in EVERY GAME. even my freaking doom emulator
(off topic DONT RAGE: i have more than two posts... i had like what, 260?) LAST NOTE: i never had this problem before.

item.title: My akward framerate problem!
item.dc:creator: killowatt
item.description:
well, it does get rid of the icons and bottom bar…
i guess that should help…
along with my antivirus.

NEW THREAD…
FOUND TEMPATURE!

Read full topic

item.title: My akward framerate problem!
item.dc:creator: Guf
item.description:
If you have ProcessExplorer running in the back ground, when it happens you can jump out and see which process is now eating the CPU (or is it something accessing the HDD lots perhaps?) as it has per-process CPU usage graphs etc.

Read full topic

item.title: My akward framerate problem!
item.dc:creator: killowatt
item.description:
Not overheating, i check my computer tempature of my GPU and its at the normal tempature.
